All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Application
Class for running a spring boot application
ControllerAdvice
Class handler for exceptions raised in controllers
CorsFilter
Class for setting the parameters of the cors request extends OncePerRequestFilter
CrudDao<T>
Interface describing the basic CRUD operations for working with data
DeleteForm
The form contains data about the file to be deleted
DirectoryDto
Directory data transfer object
DirectoryForm
The form contains data about the directory
ExceptionBody
Entity contains exception body
ExceptionFilter
Class for handling exceptions that occur in filters extends OncePerRequestFilter
File
Entity file contains all required fields
FileDto
File data transfer object
FileForm
The form contains data about the file
FilesController
Rest controller for handling requests related to files
FilesDao
Interface describes methods for working with files in the storage
FilesDaoDatabase
Class for working with a file database that implements the FilesDao interface
FilesDaoInFile
Class for working with storage of files in a file that implements the FilesDao interface
FilesDaoInMemory
Class for working with storage of files in memory that implements the FilesDao interface
FilesRepository
Files repository interface extends JpaRepository interface uses hibernate to work with file database
FilesService
Service interface for implementing the logic of the program associated with files
FilesServiceImpl
Service implementing interface FilesService
FilesStorage
Class for storing files in memory
LoginController
Rest controller for handling requests related to login
LoginForm
The form contains login data
LoginService
Service interface for implementing the logic of the program associated with login
LoginServiceImpl
Service implementing interface LoginService
Permission
Entity permission contains all required fields
State
Enumeration of states
Token
Entity token contains all required fields
TokenAuthentication
Personal token authentication implements Authentication
TokenAuthenticationProvider
Provider to implement your own token authentication implements AuthenticationProvider
TokenAuthFilter
Class that filters a request for a token extends Filter
TokenDto
Token data transfer object
TokensDao
Interface describes methods for working with tokens in the storage
TokensDaoDatabase
Class for working with a token database that implements the TokensDao interface
TokensDaoInFile
Class for working with storage of tokens in a file that implements the TokensDao interface
TokensDaoInMemory
Class for working with storage of tokens in memory that implements the TokensDao interface
TokensRepository
Tokens repository interface extends JpaRepository interface uses hibernate to work with token database
TokensStorage
Class for storing tokens in memory
User
Entity user contains all required fields
UserDetailsImpl
Class extends the UserDetails and sets the user's own characteristics
UserDetailsServiceImpl
Service provides a method to get user details extends the class UserDetailsService
UserDto
User data transfer object
UserForm
The form contains user data
UsersController
Rest controller for handling requests related to users
UsersDao
Interface describes methods for working with users in the storage
UsersDaoDatabase
Class for working with a user database that implements the UsersDao interface
UsersDaoInFile
Class for working with storage of users in a file that implements the UsersDao interface
UsersDaoInMemory
Class for working with storage of users in memory that implements the UsersDao interface
UsersRepository
Users repository interface extends JpaRepository interface uses hibernate to work with user database
UsersService
Service interface for implementing the logic of the program associated with users
UsersServiceImpl
Service implementing interface UsersService
UsersStorage
Class for storing users in memory
WebSecurityConfig
Class extends the WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter and describes the configuration of the spring boot application
